title: AI SaaS for Real Estate
description: SaaS tool automating lead gen and client follow-up for realtors using GPT-based chat.
pitch: Seize the opportunity to revolutionize the real estate industry with our cutting-edge AI SaaS platform. Automating lead gen and client follow-up, this tool shows strong cashflow with solid potential for expansion.

title: Crypto Portfolio Tracker
description: Mobile app that aggregates wallet data and tracks investments across 20+ exchanges.
pitch: Acquire a thriving crypto tracking app used by thousands to manage assets across platforms. Strong retention and stable cashflow make it an ideal digital asset.

title: Ecommerce Store: Pet Accessories
description: High-margin Shopify store selling chew toys, collars, and grooming kits.
pitch: Own a fast-growing ecommerce pet brand with 36% cashflow margin. Built on Shopify, this store combines brand appeal with operational simplicity.
